Aftab Pureval never worked as a lobbyist: contradicting the claim that his lobbying firm made millions helping Libya reduce payments owed to families of Americans killed by Libyan terrorism.
Pureval: s work at the law firm was as an antitrust associate, not as a lobbyist, further discrediting the claim that he was involved in lobbying activities.
There is no record in the Lobbying Discl: providing additional evidence that he was not engaged in lobbying work.
